Subject: Cybertronian Fire - Getting My Heart Eaten
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type:  text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding:  7bit

From: KSLawdogg@...

The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Nemesis
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:




Demon Wulf moved his arm out of the way of Scattershot's armor-piercing 
rounds and let them dig into the ground behind him, the rapid laser energy 
from Dark One having more success.  The shots dug into Demon's heavy chest 
plating and caused him to fall back a foot and a half.  "Infidel.  Do you 
think a Cybertronian can stand up to a Vok?" he asked mockingly, raising his 
sword and firing it off at Dark One, this one an energy-signature seeking one.

---

Flesh Ripper stood upright quickly, faster than he should've.  He felt a 
slight pain in his back that wa beginning to subside, and his vision was 
coming back rather fast as well.  So far he could make out a blurr in front 
of him.  And one giant blurr he suggested was the Cybertronian Fire, and an 
even larger he thought was the Element.

---

Two rockets bombarded Dark Claw's form, leaving large dents.  But Dark Claw 
was larger and more heavily equipped than Pyro.  He launched two more seeking 
missiles off at Pyro.  And according to his scanners, Pyro would be breached 
if these hit.

---

Dark One deployed a flare in the path of the incoming missile, but the 
missile dodged the flare and continued going.  "Slag!" he yelled, reverting 
to biped mode because he'd be out of the fight if hit in fighter mode.  He 
braced himself, the missile digging into his chest and exploding, sending him 
rocketing through the air a dozen feet.

---

Breakdown was in range, and fired off two grenades set to explode on impact 
at Dark Claw's general form.

---

Pyro continued driving, but the two missiles heading for him were faster than 
him.  They were also seekers, whcih wasn't a good thing.  He turned the 
mounted machine gun on his turret, firing off twenty shells at the missiles, 
only causing one to explode.  He let out a slight disembodied grunt as the 
one missile nearly breached him.

"Slag it..." he moaned, transforming slow and painfully to biped mode, 
rummaging through his subspace pocket for a different weapon other than fire. 
 He had matches, oil, and a laser rifle.  "This isn't good...fire, amazingly, 
is ineffective."  He tried to open a comm. with his fellow Oblitercons, but 
found his comm. was jammed with static.  "Stupid Maximals!" he yelled, 
running as fast as his yellow legs could go.

---

Hiss layed in the seat, deep cuts all over his face but miraculously nothing 
vital was taken out, like an optic.  He didn't stir that much, still 
recovering.

---

Scavenger saw Flesh Ripper slowly and chuckled.  Ramming him would be very 
painful, most likely only for Scavenger.  So, the mounted cannons on the side 
of his HUMV form moved ever-so-slightly to have their barrels to point at 
Flesh Ripper's torso. Forty rounds launched out from the machine guns at 
Flesh Ripper.

---

Hot Spot ducked down, avoiding two of Headstrong's shots.  He looked to see 
five different Headstrong's and didn't waste time being confused, switching 
his cannon to be a flamethrower.  In a wide arc a continuos burst of flames 
went from left to right at all five Headstrong's.
---

Groove yelled out as blasts struck him from Tantrum, unknowingly to Groove 
knocking him out of the way of someone's sword.

---

Blades didn't like it.  Long range missiles were not good.  But oh, well.  He 
armed two launchers, launching off two "smart rockets" at Sinnertwin that 
would track him using encoded computer images.

---

First Aid looked up to Sinnertwin jump at him, and it wasn't pretty.  He 
raised an arm, firing off a welding laser at Sinnertwin's abdomen as his free 
hand dug into the ground to embrace for the pain sure to come.  He noticed as 
Sinnertwin got closer so did CF/Element autogun fire.

---

Streetwise saw the Oblitercons getting pasted, and was giddy about that.  He 
wasn't about to help them.  He raised his pistol, firing off three photon 
blasts at Headstrong's torso again.

---

Imprisoner felt four explosions against his armored attack vehicle form and 
severe damage was caused, but he ignored the raging pain throughout his 
frame.  He armed both missile launchers, firing off two missiles from each 
launcher, four missiles heading for the CF.

A mounted laser weapon swerved around, firing off ten rapid blasts at the CF. 
 He felt some shells bounce of his form, autogun fire.  He laughed at that.  

---

Predator felt autogun fire and he stumbled back, small dents all over his 
body.   "Maximals were always pathetic, and now they hide inside their 
bases!" he screamed, raising his missile launcher and firing off a rocket at 
the CF.

---

Choran's rifle wasn't doing much against a ship, so he raised the rifle and 
fired off three plasma bolts at Prowl, quickly beginning modifications on it 
to make it fire rapidly.
